welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Powdersville, a charming city known for its scenic views and friendly community. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and experiencing all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greenville Downtown Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Greenville Downtown Airport serves private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Donaldson Center Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Donaldson Center Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pickens Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greenville Spartanburg International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used for domestic flights and features a variety of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is primarily used for international flights and features duty-free shopping and international cuisine options.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oconee County Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Oconee County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Anderson Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Anderson Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
